--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationLink/init(value:label:) crawled: 2025-12-02T20:39:47Z --- # init(value:label:) **Initializer** Creates a navigation link that presents the view corresponding to a codable value. ## Declaration ```swift nonisolated init

(value: P?, @ViewBuilder label: () -> Label) where P : Decodable, P : Encodable, P : Hashable ``` ## Parameters - **value**: An optional value to present. When the user selects the link, SwiftUI stores a copy of the value. Pass a `nil` value to disable the link. - **label**: A label that describes the view that this link presents. ## Discussion When someone activates the navigation link that this initializer creates, SwiftUI looks for a nearby [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/navigationDestination(for:destination:)] view modifier with a `data` input parameter that matches the type of this initializer’s `value` input, with one of the following outcomes: - If SwiftUI finds a matching modifier within the view hierarchy of an enclosing [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationStack], it pushes the modifier’s corresponding `destination` view onto the stack. - If SwiftUI finds a matching modifier in the view hierarchy of a stack that’s in a later column of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationSplitView], it puts the modifier’s destination view as the first and only item onto the stack while preserving the stack’s root view. - If there’s no matching modifier, but the link appears in a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/List] with selection inside a leading column of a navigation split view, the link updates the selection, which might affect the appearance of a trailing view. For an example of this, see [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationLink]. - In other cases, the link doesn’t do anything. Because this initializer takes a value that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Codable] protocol, you ensure that a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationPath] that includes this link can produce a non-`nil` value for its [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationPath/codable] property. This helps to make the path serializable. ## Presenting a value - **init(_:value:)**: Creates a navigation link that presents the view corresponding to a codable value, with a text label that the link generates from a localized string key.
